main event: An unidentified object described as clear plastic with a dark patch was observed near Clayton, Alabama.
interesting points: The object was observed for 30 minutes,The observer described it as appearing larger than an ordinary weather balloon at high altitude,The object was reported to have a dark gondola underneath,The observation was made visually from the ground,The object was noted to have a rotating motion when directly overhead.
sighted object: unidentified object resembling clear plastic with a dark patch
witness description: Civilian, male, age 45, with maritime service background.
